Seeing as tf.reverse(tf.scan_X(tf.reverse(x))) is useful in quite a few situations, would it make sense to add a reverse=True/False kwarg to the scan ops?
This could either be done in the Python wrappers, or in C++.

Also, I haven't yet figured out how to write the gradient for scan_prod without using the same division trick that's also been used in #2641.
